education.degree: BA in Mathematics and Computer Science
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Algorithms, Discrete Math in Computer Science, Machine Learning & Statistical Data Analysis, Number Theory, Honors Probability

work.title: AI Research Assistant
work.description: Developed systems using VQGAN+CLIP for which I built GUI interfaces connecting Jupyter Notebooks on local computers to iPads for real-time AI art creation through iPads.

work.title: Grader
work.description: Graded students' homework in MATH20 (Probability), MATH22 & MATH24 (Linear Algebra), MATH23 (Differential Equations)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
